items.title: Hamas to release US-Israeli hostage as part of efforts to reach Gaza ceasefire
items.description: Edan Alexander will be released ahead of President Donald Trump's visit to the Middle East on Tuesday.

items.title: Trump prizes more Gulf investment in the US
items.description: As the president goes to Saudi Arabia, Qatar and the UAE he wants them to buy more from the States.

items.title: US and China say substantial progress made in key trade talks
items.description: The US treasury secretary calls the talks "productive" while China's vice premier describes them as "candid".

items.title: The rare disease in a remote town where 'almost everyone is a cousin'
items.description: Many children in a Brazil town lost the ability to walk, so one scientist set about discovering why.

items.title: Why Burkina Faso's junta leader has captured hearts and minds around the world
items.description: Capt Ibrahim Traor√©, 37, is portraying himself as a champion of pan-Africanism.
